Show / Hide Table of Contents

Namespace PacManBot.Services

Classes

GameService

Manages active game instances from this bot as well as their files on disk.

HelpService

Provides help information for commands.

InputService

Handles all external input coming from Discord, using it for commands and games.

LoggingService

Receives and logs messages to the console and on disk, from everywhere in the bot.

SchedulingService

Routinely executes specific actions such as connection checks.

ScriptingService

Executes code and returns the result using predefined options, always garbage-collecting afterwards. Thank you to oatmeal and amibu

StorageService

Manages access to the bot's database.
